notes.text:
This update for ovmf fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-1298: Fixed potential UINT32 overflow in S3 ResumeCount (bsc#1225889).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.
notes.title: CVE description
